name: Abbey's White Chocolate Latte
author: Hugatunity
summary: I created this recipe for my little sister, Abbey, who's a latte fanatic. She was blown away, and drained it to the last drop! This makes one VERY large, indulgent latte, and could probably serve two. Enjoy!
ingredients: ¼ cup white chocolate chips, chopped
directions: Combine the milk and cream in a saucepan, and whisk over high heat until hot and frothy
Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and sugar
Whisk together hot espresso and white chocolate chips in a mug until smooth
If you are making two, pour half into another mug
Top with the frothy hot milk and stir to blend in the flavoring
